reviewText: Fabulous deal on a great series. Exactly what the teachers at our school were looking for.
I use the videos in my health classes. I teach 4th and 5th grade, and these videos help me support the information I teach in a fun way.

It takes A LOT of self confidence for a man to dress up in an anatomy body suit and sing about (and show off) his parts. This set does a wonderful job teaching human anatomy, it is fun and memorable, and the sets are amazing. Recommended. This set is very fascinating for kids (and adults) and it packs a punch for learning and retention. I also recommend the make-it-yourself models in this excellent book: "Human Body" by Scholastic The Body Book: Easy-to-Make Hands-on Models That Teach
